required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The PK/PD Study of SHR7280 Tablets in Healthy Subjects.
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Dose-escalation, Placebo-controlled Phase I Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Multiple Oral Doses of SHR7280 Tablets in Healthy Subjects.

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of SHR7280 tablets in healthy subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: GNRH antagonists can be used to treat sex hormone-dependent diseases, and SHR7280 is an oral GNRH antagonist. The purpose of this study is to observe the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of multiple oral doses of SHR7280 in healthy subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose to 28±2 days after dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUCτ) after the first dose of SHR7280;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit( 28±2 days after dose administration)

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed serum concentration (Cmax) after the first dose of SHR7280;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit (28±2 days after dose administration)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to maximum observed serum concentration (Tmax) after the first dose of SHR7280;

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution(Vz/F) after last morning dose of SHR7280;
